template.description: RTDM modell, MySQL, Python learn, EMail
template.name: RTDM_0506

labels.label: Generate Card Transaction data via Data Seed based on Card API
Evaluate a ML model and based on the prediction sends a recommendation.
Enrich Transactions Add Customer and Merchant Data from DB

processGroups.comments: Generate Data from test transaction set. Process 12 records per 20 sec.

entry.value: select customer.Account, customer.Age, customer.Gender, customer.Name, customer.Tel, customer.BalanceAmount, customer.CrmSegment, customer.ShortTermCredit, customer.FamilyMembers, customer.TransactionTrend, customer.IncomeCategory, customer.NrOfDebCards, customer.NrOfCredCards, customer.CreditScore, customer.AvgMonthlySpending, customer.CreditLimit, customer.PreviousDaySpending, merchant.name, merchant.lat, merchant.long from bank_card left join customer on ( customer.Account = bank_card.Account ) join merchant where bank_card.Card = '${accountNumber}' and merchant.id = ${merchantId};

processGroups.name: Enrich BankCard Transactions

config.comments: Arra jó, hogy ne egybe dobja át a fájlt, hanem szépen darabokban.
Ha nem nevezzük át a fájlt, akkor az összed darabot ugyanazon a néven mentené.
